title: E3 Request Schema
description: Schema description for the JSON request file that is accepted by E3.

type.description: Analysis type. Can be one of "LCCA", "BCA", "COST_LOSS", "PROFIT_MAXIMIZATION", "OTHER" case insensitive.

projectType.description: Project category type. Must be one of "BUILDING", "INFRASTRUCTURE", "RESILIENCE", "MANUFACTURING", "OTHER" case insensitive.

outputObjects.description: Objects to report after the analysis is complete. Some objects may take longer than others to create. Can be any combination of "REQUIRED", "OPTIONAL", "MEASURES", "SENSITIVITY", "UNCERTAINTY" case insensitive.

studyPeriod.description: Amount of time the analysis will be covering. The initial time-step (0) is included automatically, e.g. a study period of 10 will report 11 values, time-steps 0-10.

timestepValue.description: Defines what the time-steps of this analysis are. NOTE: currently no values besides "YEAR" are implemented. Can be one of "YEAR", "QUARTER", "MONTH", "DAY" case insensitive.

timestepComp.description: Defines when the discounting will be applied on monetary values. Can be one of "END_OF_YEAR", "MID_YEAR", "CONTINUOUS" case insensitive.

discountRateReal.description: Real discount rate for the analysis.

discountRateNominal.description: Nominal discount rate for the analysis.

location.description: Location where analysis is taking place.

zip.description: ZIP code where analysis is located

numberOfAlternatives.description: Number of alternatives in this analysis.

alternativeObjects.description: Array of JSON alternative object descriptions that group BCNs into alternatives.

bcns.description: Array of BCN IDs that are included in the alternative. BCN IDs can be shared with other alternatives.

bcnObjects.description: Array of JSON BCN object descriptions. Must be the same as the number defined in analysis.

type.description: Defined the BCN type. Can be on of "COST", "BENEFIT", "NON_MONETARY" case insensitive.

tags.description: Tag of this BCN that is used for reporting purposes and as a way to report a subset of BCNs within an alternative.

initialOccurrence.description: The time-step in which the BCN begins.

residualValue.description: Determines if residual value will be calculated and added to the end of this BCN.

residualValueOnly.description: Determines if this BCN is a manually calculated residual value that does not include any other BNC values.

life.description: Lifetime of this BCN. Can be greater than the study period. TODO: add constraint on default value if recur is defined

recur.description: Defines the options for when a BCN is applied multiple times throughout the study period.

interval.description: Number of time-steps between each recurrence of this BCN. i.e. interval of 1 means BCN is applied for every time step, interval of 2 means BCN is applied for every OTHER time-step, etc.

varRate.description: Determines how values are modified by their var values. Can be one of "PERCENT_DELTA", "YEAR_BY_YEAR" case insensitive. TODO: define differences

varValue.description: Values to alter BCN by while it recurs. Must be equal to the study period even if the BCN does not recur every time-step.

end.description: The end time-step of the recurrence. Can be after the study period. Defaults to the end of the study period

quantity.description: Number of non-monetary assets included in this BCN. e.g. for a BCN which defines an energy consumption of 100MW, the quantity would be 100.

quantityValue.description: Monetary value of the BCN asset. e.g. for a BCN which defines an energy consumption of 100MW at $0.05/MW, quantityValue would be 0.05 which would generate a total value in the analysis as 100MW Ã— $0.05/MW = $5

quantityVarRate.description: Determines how quantities are modified by their var values. Can be one of "PERCENT_DELTA", "YEAR_BY_YEAR" case insensitive. TODO: define differences

quantityVarValue.description: Values to alter quantity throughout the study period. Must be equal to the study period even if the BCN does not last through the study period.

quantityUnit.description: Unit of BCN which is used to group together similar BCNs for reporting purposes. e.g. for a BCN defining an energy consumption of 100MW, unit would be "MW".
